availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel F. January (Harrison County, mayor of Cynthiana )

body.p: Bourbon County and Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer and mayor. Kentucky native. Married to Josephine B. January. Father of James T. January. Farmer in Bourbon County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned eighteen enslaved persons in Bourbon County in 1850. Mayor of Cynthiana in 1860. Owned twenty-six enslaved persons in Cynthiana in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bourbon County, District 2, p. 249A.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Bourbon County, District 2, p. 9.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, Cynthiana, p. 582.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, Cynthiana, p. 128B.
"Samuel Farrow January (1809-1900)," Find A Grave, Memorial #22097897, accessed September 22, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/22097897.
